description:
Welcome world famous Justine Joli in her first hogtied shoot. Justine normally only does girl/girl scenes, however for us she let loose. Matt Williams and the Sgt have their way with our sexy newcomer in the next-door basement. Justine always wanted to be bound, dominated, and [REDACTED] to cum by two men, so who are we to disappoint.
This update was shot in widescreen HD. We are testing this format.

title: Justine Joli and Sgt. Major
